doc.after: Local schools have won several awards Brea Olinda High School and Olinda Elementary School have been named Blue Ribbon Schools Additionally Arovista Elementary Country Hills Elementary Fanning Elementary Mariposa Elementary Olinda Elementary Brea Junior High and Brea Olinda High schools have been named California Distinguished Schools Laurel Elementary received a Title I Academic Achievement Award
